metadata.title: CVE-2018-17825 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in AdPlug 2.3.1. There are several double-freevulnerabilities in the CEmuopl class in emuopl.cpp because of adestructor's two OPLDestroy calls, each of which frees TL_TABLE, SIN_TABLE,AMS_TABLE, and VIB_TABLE.

criterions.comment: adplug: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
